meanings.definition: The quality or state of being iniquitous.
meanings.sent1: The iniquitousnesses of his actions were evident to all.
meanings.sent2: The town was plagued by the iniquitousnesses of corrupt officials.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the iniquitousnesses of the situation made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The iniquitousnesses of the crime cast a dark shadow over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The iniquitousnesses of the villain's plan were truly diabolical.

meanings.definition: Acts or practices characterized by iniquity.
meanings.sent1: The iniquitousnesses committed by the gang were shocking.
meanings.sent2: Society must stand against the iniquitousnesses that threaten its values.
meanings.sent3: The iniquitousnesses of the cat stealing treats from the dog were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The iniquitousnesses of the storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The iniquitousnesses of the corporation's actions were exposed by the whistleblower.
